rooms.description: A spacious living room with floor-to-ceiling windows to maximize natural light and ventilation. Bohemian style decor with reclaimed wood accents and vibrant textiles.
An open-plan kitchen adjoining the dining area featuring a contemporary design with sustainable materials and floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light.
A dedicated dining space integrated within the kitchen-living area. The room includes ample seating arranged to promote a communal atmosphere.

openings.description: A large front door with glass panels to allow natural light while maintaining privacy.
An additional back entrance providing an alternative entry and access to outdoor spaces.
